attributes.action: Ensure annual pension increase apply to all pensioners living abroad
attributes.background: We want the Government to ensure that pensioners get an annual increase if they live abroad in certain countries. Currently some people do not receive increases even if they have worked 50 years in the UK prior to retiring abroad.
